channel.title: IsarValley Show
channel.description: Podcast about the Developer Community in Munich
channel.itunes:author: Werner Huber

item.title: Episode 1: IsarValley meets Silicon Valley (Live from WWDC2018) with Special Guest Andreas Fischer and Franz-Joseph Busch
item.description: We are kicking off our brand new Tech Podcast with a very special edtion live from WWDC2018 in San Jose.
item.itunes:summary: Talking with my tow guests Andreas Fischer from Audi Business Inovation and Franz-Joseph Busch about the Apple Developer Conference and the Silicon Valley in general.
